title: Medications for Rapid Tranquilization of Agitated Patients
itunes:title: Medications for Rapid Tranquilization of Agitated Patients
description:
In this episode, we discuss a systematic review and network analysis that compares 11 medications for treating severe agitation in the emergency department. Which medications have been shown to work best? 

Faculty: Jim Phelps, M.D. 
Host: Richard Seeber, M.D.

  • Learn more about our memberships here
  • Earn 0.5 CMEs: Quick Take Vol. 39
  • Rapid Tranquilization of the Agitated Patient in the Emergency Department: A Systematic Review and Network Meta-Analysis
